mapper.select: {CALL PROC_STU_ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER( #{ONLINE_TEST_NUMBER}, #{STUDENT_NUMBER}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT1}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT2}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT3}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT4}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT5}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT6}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT7}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT8}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT9}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT10}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT11}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT12}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT13}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT14}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT15}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT16}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT17}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT18}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_SUBMIT19}, #{ONLINE_TEST_ANSWER_FILE}, #{PEXCEP, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String}, #{PEXCEPMSG, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} )}

{CALL PROC_ONLINE_TEST_Q_CUD( #{TR_CODE}, #{ONLINE_TEST_QUESTION_NUMBER}, #{ONLINE_TEST_NUMBER}, #{ONLINE_TEST_QUESTION_DIV}, #{ONLINE_TEST_QUESTION_QNUMBER}, #{ONLINE_TEST_QUESTION_CONTENT}, #{ONLINE_TEST_QUESTION_ANSWER1}, #{ONLINE_TEST_QUESTION_ANSWER2}, #{ONLINE_TEST_QUESTION_ANSWER3}, #{ONLINE_TEST_QUESTION_ANSWER4}, #{ONLINE_TEST_QUESTION_CORRECT}, #{ONLINE_TEST_QUESTION_PICTURE}, #{ONLINE_TEST_QUESTION_POINT}, #{PEXCEP, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String}, #{PEXCEPMSG, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} )}
